subject: Football
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: While not a splashy choice for head coach, McAdoo, the team’s offensive coordinator for the last two years, is not a continuation of the Tom Coughlin era, either.
snippet: While not a splashy choice for head coach, McAdoo, the team’s offensive coordinator for the last two years, is not a continuation of the Tom Coughlin era, either.
